metadata.name: Python Reverse Shell Execution Via PTY And Socket Modules
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of python with calls to the socket and pty module in order to connect and spawn a potential reverse shell.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('python')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pty')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('socket')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spawn')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.connect')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of python with calls to the socket and pty module in order to connect and spawn a potential reverse shell.
